wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
I totally agree with your sentiments. When the presidential race doesn't have a former VP who is hanging his hat on previous accomplishments, the only thing they will have is mud to sling.
And Dale: "Of course, the cynic in me doesn't think this is a real bad thing. I am definitely a proponent of a small, less intrusive government." You said you are on the other political end of the spectrum, Republican I deduce, maybe a more than slim majority can reduce the Republican's changes the last 6+ years to create a larger, more intrusive government. :)
